meanings.definition: A slang term for the act of vomiting.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he couldn't hold back the yukes.
meanings.sent2: The smell of the garbage made her yukes rise.
meanings.sent3: The sight of the slimy fish made her yukes come up.
meanings.sent4: The roller coaster ride was so intense, it felt like her stomach was full of yukes.
meanings.sent5: The yukes splattered all over the bathroom floor, creating a disgusting mess.

meanings.definition: A slang term for the feeling of nausea or disgust.
meanings.sent1: The rotten smell of the garbage gave her the yukes.
meanings.sent2: The creepy crawlies on her skin made her feel the yukes coming on.
meanings.sent3: The slimy texture of the food gave her the yukes, but she tried to hide it.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie was so scary, it sent shivers down her spine and yukes in her stomach.
meanings.sent5: The yukes bubbled up inside her as she watched the disgusting scene unfold.
